steps.title: You may or may not mesh with one anotherâ€™s social circles.
steps.content: You may or may not mesh with one anotherâ€™s social circles. Behr stresses that itâ€™s important to â€œ[consider]...how someone with a significant age gap can fit into your life as it is currently,â€ including â€œyour current social circles [and] your family and your friendships.â€ Is it important to you that your partner be able to fit in with your friend group? If the idea of partnering with someone with a family feels overwhelming, keep in mind it might not end up being as big a deal as it seems at first.
